headline: NiSource Earns Spot on Dow Jones Sustainability Indices for 11th Consecutive Year
summary: MERRILLVILLE, Ind., December 23, 2024--NiSource Inc. (NYSE: NI), one of the largest fully-regulated utilities in the United States, has been named to the 2024 Dow Jones Sustainability Indices (DJSI), marking the 11th consecutive year the company has earned the recognition. The DJSI are float-adjusted market capitalization weighted indices that measure the performance of companies using environmental, social and governance (ESG) criteria.
